meanings.definition: A woman who is a villain.
meanings.sent1: The movie's villainesses plotted to steal the treasure.
meanings.sent2: The villainesses in the story were always causing trouble.
meanings.sent3: The villainesses tried to outsmart the heroes but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as deceptive as the villainesses in a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the cunning villainesses lurking in the shadows.

meanings.sent1: The group of villainesses gathered to discuss their evil plans.
meanings.sent2: She dressed up as one of the villainesses for the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The villainesses decided to have a picnic instead of causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with flowers as colorful as the villainesses' personalities.
meanings.sent5: The town was under attack by a horde of villainesses.
